thread.title: Canadian Olympic Committee president quits amid inquiry
thread.title_full: Canadian Olympic Committee president quits amid inquiry

title: Canadian Olympic Committee president quits amid inquiry
text: > Sports Canadian Olympic Committee president quits amid inquiry FILE - In this July 9, 2015, file photo, Canadian Olympic Committee President Marcel Aubut speaks during a World Sport Luncheon in Montreal. Aubut has resigned as president of the Canadian Olympic Committee while under investigation for a sexual harassment complaint. The committee said in a statement Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, its investigation now ends. Since the original complaint, two other women made allegations against Aubut. (Graham Hughes/The Canadian Press via AP, File)
